short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Animal Chibi wallpaper turn new tab to HD Animal Chibi background. Custom Animal Chibi wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Animal Chibi wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Toggle between random and favorite Animal Chibi backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts for quick access.
5. Displays the current date and time automatically.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant game playing from the new tab.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Animal Chibi tab.
